title: System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement
body: Mono can't find System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement as an assembly reference even when installed from NuGet. Looking at Mono's api versions in finder, I can see that such a .dll doesn't exist but it is part of the 4.5.2 .NET Framework in Windows.

nodes.body: @radical is there a better repo in mono for this issue? I don't think it belongs on this repo.
